<!-- Generated by cdocs. -->
# calc

---
## `calc_even`
### Description
Tells if a value is even or not.
### Returns: `int`
1 if even, 0 if odd.
### Parameters
`int value` : An integer value.

---
## `calc_mean`
### Description
Calculates the average.
### Returns: `float`
The average. 
### Parameters
`const float* set` : Values used to get the average.
`unsigned size` : Number of values in set.
